snippet: A restoration expert in Allentown, Pa., has only one customer: Nicola Bulgari, the Italian jewelry magnate, whose collection focuses on workaday prewar American models.
abstract: Profile of auto restoration expert Keith Flickinger, whose lone customer is the Italian jewelery magnate Nicola Bulgari; Flickinger maintains Bulgari's extensive collection of classic American cars, which focuses on workaday prewar models.
lead_paragraph: A restoration expert in Allentown, Pa., has only one customer: Nicola Bulgari, the Italian jewelry magnate, whose collection focuses on workaday prewar American models.
